wavelet analysis
[trend function (trend)]


Functions

int surfit::trend_get_details_level ()
 returns the depth of wavelet decomposition
bool surfit::trend_decomp ()
 makes one wavelet-decomposition
bool surfit::trend_auto_decomp (REAL eps)
 calls trend_decomp() until difference between calc_approx_norm() will be lower than eps
bool surfit::trend_recons ()
 makes one wavelet-reconstruction
bool surfit::trend_full_recons ()
 makes all possible wavelet-reconstruction (recontructs original trendtion)
